restaurants.title: Archaeological Rest House
restaurants.descriptions: The location makes it completely worthwhile. Tk1400 for a 2 person room with AC. Fan rooms were also available, The room was basic but clean, mosquito nets were provided over the beds. Attached bathroom had a western style. The rest house is actually within the limits of the archaeological site (Somapura Vihara) you are not restricted to visiting only within the opening hours. You will get up at sunrise and have the ruins to the morning mist which was really magical. The caretaker lady can provide a homecooked dinner and it is very tasty. Breakfast at the restaurant in the village.Note that you need to buy entrance tickets for the vihara/museum in addition to the room charge.

restaurants.descriptions: The location makes it completely worthwhile. Tk1400 for a 2 person room with AC. restaurants.title: Momo Inn
restaurants.descriptions: Momo Inn, 15th number Five Star Hotel In Bangladesh, 151 Rooms, Two Swimming Pool, Gym, Banquet, Specialized Board Meeting Hall , Kids Zone, Multi Cuisine Restaurant, Concierge, Tour Management, Transportation, Suite, Watch Tower, Lobby, Lobby Cafe, Car parking , River Tour, Tent Tour etc.

restaurants.title: Red Chillies Restaurant and Guest house
restaurants.descriptions: SiesTa Hotel and Convention in Bogra city center offers picturesque views archological ancient site and discover Northern Bangladesh. SiesTa is the first upper upscale business boutique star hotel and convention in the city, which is the largest rooftop swimming pool hotel in North Bengal. Because the hotel is located in entrance secure place in front Jahangirabad Cantonments beside Transcom-Pepsi- Prothom alo plant and behind Open University-BADC. Guests are within walking distance of Asian highway circle Banani and International Sheed Chandu Cricket Stadium. Business travelers appreciate the exclusive Business Class Lounge, as well as amenities like free high-speed, wireless Internet. When it's time to relax, the SiesTa makes it easy with a circular rooftop swimming pool, a pool Caf√© & BBQ, Shisha bar and a spa. In addition, each room and suite includes contemporary furnishings, lavish bath amenities and a complimentary breakfast. With two different restaurants and shisha bar serving everything from Chinese/ Thai /Indian / Continental favorites and Bangladeshi dishes to refreshing cocktails and freshly pressed juice, patrons never run out of dining options. Our hotel also boasts the largest pillar less 02 banquet and 1100 capacity convention facility along 02 conference & meeting hall, 1 Board meeting room in Bogra for business and social events.
restaurants.district: Sherpur Road, Near PTI Hotel SiesTa Bogra, Bogra, Bangladesh

restaurants.title: Hotel Naz Garden
restaurants.descriptions: Naz Garden, have around 100 rooms of various standards. Leaving behind an enormous selection of rooms we, at Naz Garden, have a wide selection of food outlets providing Continental, Bangladeshi, Indian, Thai and Chinese cuisines. We have 8 food outlets in Naz Garden, which are spread according to the ambience of the surrounding. Swimming Pools, Gymnasium, Bar, Banquet, Conference hall, Ball Room, Lake, WIFI Hotspot Internet Access and many more are the main attraction of Naz Garden.
restaurants.district: Bogra By-Pass Highway Silimpur, Bogra, Bangladesh

restaurants.title: Parjatan Motel
restaurants.descriptions: Parjatan Motel, 17th number Five Star Hotel In Bangladesh, 151 Rooms, Two Swimming Pool, Gym, Banquet, Specialized Board Meeting Hall , Kids Zone, Multi Cuisine Restaurant, Concierge, Tour Management, Transportation, Suite, Watch Tower, Lobby, Lobby Cafe, Car parking , River Tour, Tent Tour etc.

restaurants.title: Akboria
restaurants.descriptions: 5 Types of rooms available, starting from economic (for drivers) to Double-AC. The hotel is situated adjacent to the Sub-District Police Station, making it a preferable choice because of security for customers, domestic and foreign.
restaurants.district: Kazi Nazrul Islam Road Kazi Nazrul Islam Road, Sathmatha, Bogra Bangladesh

restaurants.title: Annex Suites
restaurants.descriptions: Annex Suites in Bogra has 3-star accommodation with a terrace. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, room service and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel features family rooms.
restaurants.district: 174 Shahid Abdul Jabbar Road, Bogra, Bangladesh

restaurants.title: Hotel Sarina Dhaka
restaurants.descriptions: Hotel Sarina Dhaka is located at Banani adjacent to diplomatic enclave and the fast growing commercial area of Gulshan, Baridhara and Banani. Its 15 minutes drive from the Hazrat Shahjalal International Airport. Hotel Sarina Dhaka offers everything that a Business Traveler needs with an exclusive touch of personalized service.
restaurants.district: 17 Plot #27 Road Banani C/A, Dhaka City 1213 Bangladesh

restaurants.title: THE WAY Dhaka
restaurants.descriptions: THE WAY Dhaka is a beautiful 5 star upscale boutique hotel located in the prime diplomatic and business district of Dhaka city. The property houses thirty-eight beautifully appointed rooms and two suites and come with free WiFi, in-room electronic safe, 42 inch SMART LED TV, rain shower, 24 hour room service, one specialty restaurant, two cafes, an infinity swimming pool, gym, sauna, steam room.

restaurants.title: Six Seasons Hotel
restaurants.descriptions: Even before the shovel first hit the ground to build the hotel's foundation, we had one goal in mind- to provide unrivaled luxury for all of our guests. We put in the finest amenities and facilities in our hotel, and we have also included some awe-inspiring sights. As the project progressed, it slowly dawned on us- not only have we offered the ultimate luxury in the Bangladeshi hospitality industry, we have also offered the finest facilities in all of the Indian Subcontinent. We have included many Bangladeshi firsts - heated, salt water, and best of all, hanging, and partially transparent, infinity pool, a 119 feet tall mosaic mural, and a state-of-the-art heating and water filtration system for the whole building. To that we have added jaw-dropping features- glass floor on our Sky Pool Bar, a spectacular rooftop private dining room, and some mouth-watering culinary options, among them a live Teppanyaki show and a sushi bar. Six Seasons is an extraordinary hotel that offers every indulgence. With per room expenditure matching or exceeding ultra-luxury hotels chains around the world, you would not expect any less than the finest. At Six Seasons Hotel, we redefine luxury.
restaurants.district: Nr 96 House Nr 19 Road Gulshan 2, Dhaka City 1212 Bangladesh

restaurants.title: Best Western PLUS Maya
restaurants.descriptions: The Finest Airport Boutique Hotel You Would Ever Stay! Located 5 minutes away from the airport, right after arriving at Dhaka, guests can take a rest and unwind at the luxury airport boutique hotel of Dhaka. The property is equipped with all modern facilities of luxury living from the finest hotel wares to high-end hospitality products, fittings and fixtures. The latest addition in franchise is the Best Western Plus¬Æ Maya had its soft launch on December 2020, is located at Nikunja 2, Dhaka, Bangladesh. Experience where stylish, modern design meets exceptional service and great value. Moreover, Best Western Plus¬Æ Maya offers unique creation of finest delicacies made by its expert chefs at its various fine dining restaurants caf√©s including The Cove Restaurant and Madison Caf√© at the reception area. The pool deck restaurant called The Runway, situated at the rooftop offers immaculate views of the city and airport runway with mouth watering dishes for the evening. Wherever Life Takes You, Best Western Is There
restaurants.district: Road 17-18 | Kabi Farooq Sharoni | Dhaka | 1229 Plot 1C-2C, Dhaka City 1229 Bangladesh

restaurants.title: Holiday Inn Dhaka City Centre
restaurants.descriptions: Welcome to Holiday Inn Dhaka City Centre! Holiday Inn hotel is one of the most prominent hotel brands in IHG & best-known brand for family & is kids friendly, have the most extensive loyalty program in the world, IHG One Rewards. Perfectly located in the heart of the city & easy access to business districts including Gulshan, Banani, Dhamondi, Motijheel, Secretariat and Hazrat Shahjalal International Airport.The Holiday Inn Dhaka City Center hotel is available 24/7 with premium accommodation, professional services and spaces, quick and fresh food that keep guests connected, productive, comfortable, and rejuvenated during their stay. Wake up with our power shower after a good sleep with high-quality bedding and choice of soft or firm pillows, with option of rooms which comfortably accommodate up to three guests.
restaurants.district: 23 Shahid Tajuddin Ahmed Sharani Tejgaon, Dhaka City 1208 Bangladesh

restaurants.title: Renaissance Dhaka Gulshan Hotel
restaurants.descriptions: Strategically located between the business epicenter and diplomatic enclave of Gulshan, Dhaka, Renaissance Dhaka Gulshan Hotel is near many attractions. Enjoy hassle-free travel to and from the Hazrat Shahjalal International Airport, 20 minutes away. Once you get to the hotel, you'll experience the sophisticated elements and uber designs throughout the 211 stylish rooms and suites located in our hotel. When it's time to eat, enjoy the finest cuisine like BAHAR - a restaurant specializing in local and international cuisine, SEAR - a place to experience fine dining from across the world with great food, great music & great people, R Bar - a place to enjoy electronic music with your favorite choice of drinks, as well as a vibrant Gulshan Baking Company (GBC) with world-class bakeries and fresh brews. Relax & rejuvenate at our R Spa by enriching your experience in world class therapy.
restaurants.district: 78 Gulshan Avenue Gulshan 1, Dhaka City 1212 Bangladesh

restaurants.title: Bengal Blueberry
restaurants.descriptions: Welcome to Holiday Inn Dhaka City Centre! Holiday Inn hotel is one of the most prominent hotel brands in IHG & best-known brand for family & is kids friendly, have the most extensive loyalty program in the world, IHG One Rewards. Perfectly located in the heart of the city & easy access to business districts including Gulshan, Banani, Dhamondi, Motijheel, Secretariat and Hazrat Shahjalal International Airport.The Holiday Inn Dhaka City Center hotel is available 24/7 with premium accommodation, professional services and spaces, quick and fresh food that keep guests connected, productive, comfortable, and rejuvenated during their stay. Wake up with our power shower after a good sleep with high-quality bedding and choice of soft or firm pillows, with option of rooms which comfortably accommodate up to three guests.

restaurants.title: The Westin Dhaka
restaurants.descriptions: Relax, revive, and experience renewal at The Westin Dhaka - the five-star hotel in Gulshan, Dhaka, Bangladesh. Nestled in the new business district, we are steps from renowned shopping malls, foreign missions, restaurant, art, private clubs, and multinationals. Refreshing and contemporary, our 241 spacious guest rooms and suites offer modern amenities. Restore the body and expand the mind with the pure relaxation of our signature Heavenly Bed(R). The oversized four-fixture bathroom with Heavenly Shower(R) ensures you feel refreshed. Every guest room offers a generous workspace and High Speed Internet Access. Five contemporary meeting venues offer over 2,000 square meters of functional space. This includes state-of-the-art meeting and banquet facilities featuring LED lighting for an extensive variety of lighting effects, customized projections, and a sound system in the Westin Grand Ballroom.
restaurants.district: Main Gulshan Avenue Plot 1 cwn , Road 45, Gulshan 2, Dhaka, Dhaka City 1212 Bangladesh

restaurants.title: Royal Park Residence
restaurants.descriptions: located in a quiet residential area, a small luxury boutique hotel in the Gulshan-Banani-Baridhara diplomatic enclave, yet in very close proximity to the commercial hub and the international airport. Royal Park is managed by a Sri Lankan luxury hotel operator and is patronized by a wide clientele across the globe. Boasting of a very high rate of repeat/regular guests, Royal Park has a well-trained team of professionals who always exceed guest expectations with highly personalized service. This small, luxury, yet the homely boutique hotel has all the facilities and services of a large hotel and is ISO & HACCP certified, and has earned certificates of 'excellence' and BRAVO badges from Trip Adviser
restaurants.district: NO 85 ROAD No. 25A, BLOCK A, BANANI Dhaka, Dhaka City 1213 Bangladesh

restaurants.title: Hotel Sea crown
restaurants.descriptions: Situated on the beachfront and offering a 24-hour front desk, Hotel Sea Crown is located just 1.5 km from the famous Sugandha Beach. Free WiFi access is available. Each air-conditioned room here will provide you with a seating area and work desk. Featuring a shower, private bathroom comes with free toiletries. At Hotel Sea Crown you will find a garden. Other facilities offered at the property include a shared lounge, a tour desk and luggage storage. The property offers free parking. The property is located just 3 km from the scenic Laboni Beach and 4.1 km from Buddhist Temple and the popular Cox's Bazar. The Cox's Bazar Airport and Cox's Bazar Bus Station are located within 4.8 km.The guests can enjoy their meals at the in-house restaurant and refreshing alcoholic and non-alcoholic beverages at the bar. Room service is available for 24-hour.

restaurants.title: Hotel Royal International
restaurants.descriptions: Conveniently situated in the Khulna part of Khulna, this property puts you close to attractions and interesting dining options. Don't leave before paying a visit to the famous Jessore Airport. As an added bonus, restaurant is provided on-site to conveniently serve your needs. The hotel room rate is less than offered by you. Received payment receipt as per hotel room rate, not as booked through you. This has been financial losses to me as I am unable to reimburse total rent paid for.

restaurants.title: Sikder Resort & Villas
restaurants.descriptions: Sikder Resort & Villas is a perfect getaway destination far from the crowded city into the beautiful resort including natural khal (cannel) with bridge, green landscape, several attractive Picnic Spots, garden with setting arrangement, surrounded by walking path will connect you to nature.The environment is stunning. Well decorated and spacious. A huge swimming pool and flower garden, lake, boat, everything is excellent to spend time. Probably the best place to stay in Kuakata. The highlight is their buffet breakfast.The weaker side is their service and the facilities inside the room like Air conditioner, Wifi, Bath tub etc.
restaurants.district: Opposite of ECO Park, Kuakata 8652 Bangladesh

restaurants.title: Hotel Graver Inn International
restaurants.descriptions: Nice atmosphere, near to the beach, cordial staff and overall great food they served. Kuakata is a fishing town. If you love fish and want to taste different varieties of fresh fish in my opinion Hotel Graver Inn is the best option. Their cuisines are great and delicate.From the hotel very close to Sea Beach, only five minutes walking distance. The hotel is very modern and well decorated. Room and Washroom were clean with drinking water, tea kettle, toiletries, and towels. Staffs are very friendly and cordial. The Hotel has own large parking area with strict security. The hotel price was included a complimentary buffet breakfast
restaurants.district: East Side of Rakhain Mohila Market, Kuakata 8600 Bangladesh

restaurants.title: Hotel Nilanjona Kuakata
restaurants.descriptions: Hotel Nilanjona is situated at opposite of Rakhain Mohila Market or beside the Agrani Bank, Kuakata. Total Number of rooms in This Hotel is 50. There are six types of rooms are available at Hotel Nilanjona. These are Family bed (Couple + Single), Couple bed, Twin bed and Single bed. All types of room have AC and Non AC facilities.Hotel Nilanjona has a well-decorated conference room with the capacity of 150 persons. They can arrange sound systems and other accessories for conference hall. Hotel Nilanjona has fully air conditioned Restaurant facilitates named as ‚ÄúDining‚Äù. They are able to provide delicious food items at reasonable price. Check in time is 11:30am and checkout time from hotel Nilanjona is at 12:00pm.
restaurants.district: Kuakata sea beach Road Opposite of Rakhaine Market, Kuakata Bangladesh

restaurants.title: Khan Palace
restaurants.descriptions: Hotel Khan Palace in KuƒÅkƒÅta features 3-star accommodation with a terrace. With a garden, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom.

restaurants.title: Hotel Radiation
restaurants.descriptions: Facing the beachfront, Hotel Radiation offers 3-star accommodation in SƒÅkhƒÅria and has a garden, shared lounge and terrace. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, room service and currency exchange for guests. At the hotel rooms have a balcony, a private bathroom and a flat-screen TV. When you plan a journey to Bangladesh, remember that accommodation is very important. Hotel Radiation is located in Dhaka - Kuakata Highway and it is a nice place to stay. Find out more about accommodation such as: room availability, facilities, or customer reviews.
